name: Protur Palmeras Playa

reviews.text: Just got back from Sa Coma and stayed at this hotel. I booked it purely because of the reviews on this site, and was not disappointed. The staff are superb, the hotel is spotless, the food is fabulous, the beach ( one min walk away) is lovely. The air con in the rooms is the best I have ever come across, and the showers are amazing, the shower head is the size of a dinner plate!! I went all inclusive and would definitely stay there again. Sa Coma is small , don't expect fab boutiques , it is quaint and friendly tho. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Fab Hotel

reviews.text: The Palmeras Playa is a 4 star hotel that delivers a 5 star service. Every member of staff works to the highest standard and every single one of them is a credit to the manager and to the Protur Hotels group.The food was of the highest quality and cooked to perfection,,there was also a very wide selection on offer at every sitting.The cleanliness of the hotel and ground's was outstanding and it was an absolute pleasure to stay here !!!!!
reviews.title: An excellent holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I both age 20, stayed at Palmeras Playa from 7th Sep 2013 to 15th Sep. Our flight times weren't great so we arrived very early morning and left very early morning too. The first day we were there, we were very impressed with the hotel. The weather was disappointing as it rained all day but the room had a tv with some english channels so we spent a lot of the day in the room. The room was very big and modern. Curtains shut out lots of light if you like a bit of a lay in. I have to admit, the air con was a bit temperamental. Sometimes the room felt very cold at night and then very hot in the morning. The bathroom was modern and clean. Including a hairdryer although it wasn't very powerful if you have lots of hair! The entertainment was quite good in the evening as it suits all ages. The Tom Jones tribute act was incredible and if you have kids, they have a mini disco from half 8 til half 9. The food variation was fantastic. Plenty to choose from and the Italian night by the pool bar was perfect. The staff in the restaurant were always prompt at cleaning up and making sure people are seated quickly. The beach is just a 2 minute walk down the road. We went just as school started so the beach wasn't too busy. We didn't buy sunbeds or an umbrella as it would work out too expensive as we went to the beach almost every day. We just layed our towles down on the floor. The hotel was very clean and the staff spoke very good english! The reception staff were very helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family. I had a brilliant time and I will return to this hotel again!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel and Great Location!

reviews.text: We have just returned from an 11 night holiday in the Palmeras Playa & what can we say but fantastic. On arrival our room wasn't unfortunately ready as the previous occupants hadn't checked out when they should have however Clare on reception soon sorted this out. The rooms are large & the bathroom is too with a brilliant shower with plenty of hot water. Our room overlooked the stage & got the early morning sun but was ideal for watching the evening entertainment which was usually a tribute act but normally finished around 10.30pm. We were only round the corner from S'illot which was a nice little resort with bars & restaurants. If you like to dance then visit the Brittania Pub or the Kings Head which both open until around 3am. The Music Bar is also worth a visit. When we are on holiday we normally dine out for an evening but the choice of food on offer at the hotel meant we didn't need to. There was everything you could possibly want - chicken,pork,beef,lamb,quail,liver,fish,prawns,mussels,squid,octopusplenty of vegetables & each night you could have a freshly made stirfry if you wished. What can we say about the desserts? You're certainly not spoilt for choice here either. There is a wide variety of cakes & ice cream available every day. There is food to suit everyone from children to adults & if you require any special diet the staff help you with this to suit your needs. As in other reviews the pool is not as big as pictures may show & it's freezing until you get used to it. You can step in easily at the shallow end but need to watch as the pool suddenly slopes & you may find yourself in trouble if you are not a confident swimmer. The pool area is lovely & clean & yes the beds are close together but you can move them about a little. The best area we found at the pool were the beds over by the pool bar - yes it did take a little longer for the sun to come round but we did as everyone else did & put our towels down before breakfast. There were people reserving beds from 7am onwards but there was no need as there were plenty. If you didn't want the pool then the lovely beach was only down the road. It cost us 15 Euros for 2 beds & a brolly for a day. You are better to buy a lilo & the hotel have brollies they can lend you otherwise just put your towels on the sand. You can walk into Cala Millor just along the coast or take the land train for 4 Euros return. We would recommend the hotel to anyone & hope to return to it in the near future as the staff cannot do enough for you. Thank you to you all.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: We have just returned from our 3rd holiday at the Palmeras Playa for a 10 day stay on an all inclusive basis and once again, we were not disappointed with the whole holiday experience provided at this excellent hotel. This holiday was the first time we have stayed at the Palmeras since its refurbishment in 2011 and we found that the hotel has been upgraded to a very high standard in all areas.
reviews.title: 3rd Visit and it Just Keeps Getting Better!
Excellent stay in Palmeras Playa
reviews.text: We arrived at Palmras Playa in Sa Coma 2013-09-06, and we stayed for 2 weeks. All reception staff was wonderful. The restaurant and the restaurant people was also good. Food was nice, and the staff in the restaurant worked really hard to remove old plates and make clean tables. Chefs was perfect to. Cleaning in room was perfect and it was very big rooms. The hotel was very close to beach, maybe 2 minutes walk. Poolbar and pool was in perfect condition.

reviews.title: Lovely holiday
reviews.text: The entertainment in evening was also perfect. They tried really hard to make good shows, and they managed to do it. Its not a hotel to travel as young and single, it´s a family or couple hotel. Hotel area was quiet 24:00, it was very good.

reviews.title: Ticked all the boxes
reviews.text: Best regards Dominique, Anna and Davyd.

reviews.title: Going back next year!!!!
reviews.text: I had a lovely time in this hotel food was good puddings to die for I would recommend protur palmeras I would go back to this hotel I love the entertainment loved the little train the swimming pool could of been warmer and weather a lot better than it was the Verona resturant was very nice I went with my carer we went on a sailing adventure water was choppy if we had of gone on another day where it was not choppy caves of drach was very interesting but the day activities could of been a lot better like have aqua aerobics or water Zumba

reviews.title: Fab Family Holiday
reviews.text: We visited the Protur Palmeras Playa hotel in Sa Coma Mallorca between 12th - 19th September and had a fab time. We were a party of six (aged 53, 51, 25, 24, 18 & 17) and we had 3 rooms.

Just returned from the PALMERAS PLAYA in SA COMA and it does exactly what it says on the tin fantastic staff, friendly approachable and always eager without being pushy got it just right, The food was really good and there was always something for everyone travelled with five friends and really cant fault the place a great big thank you to all the staff and they certainly lead by example. the Hotel itself is spotless and the cleaning staff always smiling and obliging. The restaurant is lovely and the sweets are to die for, bigger waistlines all round. Beach about a three minute walk to the promanade and lots to do on the beach. entertainment was average but still enjoyed all the acts presented you can order more than two drinks at a time which helped with six in our party. This hotel leads the way by a mile and lots could learn from them. Once again a Really BIG THANK YOU for a wonderful holiday dont normally go back to the same place twice but we will definately return next year OLE .

reviews.text: my partner and i stayed at this hotel for a week in september (1-8-13 to7-8-13) we found it a BEAUTIFUL place to be the meals staff and cleanliness was top notch we couldnt find anything to complain about because everything was perfect .the only thing that was noy-t up to scratch were the holiday reps but apart from that we had areally lovely time and would consider visiting there again sometime in the future
reviews.title: sunny days

reviews.text: glynnbarb
reviews.title: "Fantastic Holiday,Amazing Hotel"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the palmeras playa early hrs 29th August for a 2 week stay, check in was very quick and we were escorted to the lifts and told where our room was by a lovely, polite gentleman, on entering the room we were amazed at just how big it was, plenty of space with a lovely bathroom, huge walk in shower, and even a hair dryer, we requested twin beds as it was myself and my son staying here, the bedroom was lovely separated from the lounge area with wooden sliding doors, the balcony was much bigger than other hotels with a lovely glass front and a lovely view over the pool, side street and main street, we were in block A, 5th floor and got plenty sun on our balcony in the late afternoon. All the staff from the reception staff, bar staff, restauraunt staff and chefs and cleaners are all lovely and polite, very friendly, each and every one is a real credit to this hotel and they all work so hard, the whole place is immaculate, the pool area is also spotless and is cleaned several times a day, even all the sun loungers hosed down every night, the hotel really is beautiful.
reviews.title: return to this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restauraunt... Well where do i start, there really is something for everyone here, there is so much choice from salads and pastas, pizzas, chips etc, roast meats, veg etc, to the cooking station where you can have fresh meats, steaks etc cooked in front of you or delicious stir frys they do there too! Cooked by a nice friendly chinese chef! My fave meal of the day was always breakfast and i was made up as there was always plenty of brown sauce to go with the full english!!! The deserts tasted as good as they looked... Amazing! The pool area and pool bar are also very good and plenty big enough i think for the size of hotel, at the pool bar they also put on plenty choice of food throughout the day ( you will never go hungry staying here ) and you can help yourself to ice creams, coffee, cake etc. There was plenty going on throughout the day... Kids clubs, water basketball, bingo and there was entertainment on every night starting about 9.30pm after the kids mini disco, The Beatles, Rud Stewart , some were really good and the others (the mime show) well we done some laughing at these! There was always somewhere to sit and a great choice of drinks too which i have to say the bar staff are very generous with their measures! We also got out and about quite a bit we got the little "noddy" train into cala millor quite a few times where there are a lot more shops and bars etc, this stops right at the front of the hotel, we also done the trip to Marineland, i really enjoyed the shows there they were fantastic! We also went on the glass bottom Katamaran 3 hr trip ( white cat ) which i would recommend they take you on a lovely tour around the Island, visiting the Pirate cave, Purto Cristo and many other places, good value for money! All in all we had a fantastic holiday at the Palmeras Playa and have got some lovely memories to treasure! If you are thinking of booking then go for it! You will not be disapointed!!!! One last thing, thank you so much to all the staff for my lovely surprise bottle of cava and birthday wishes x

reviews.title: Protur Palmeras Playa
reviews.text: The room was lovely with an annexe bedroom lounge area and a contemporary bathroom with a walk in shower. I think I am right in saying that all rooms have a pool view.

reviews.title: Great holiday
reviews.text: The restaurant has a good selection of tasty dishes and also offers a selection of freshly prepared stir frys, cooked meat, chicken and fish all cooked in front of you by two chefs. As has been said before, the sweets are in another league from other all inclusive hotels we have visited. Once a week there is a gala dinner which absolutely outstanding.

aka: Protur Palmeras Playa Hotel Sa Coma
description: The Protur Palmeras Playa Aparthotel with 4 stars is one of our aparthotels in Majorca. Located in Sa Coma, it is located 100 meters from the Sa Coma beach and 500 meters from the small fishing port of s'Illot.Our aparthotel in Sa Coma has Junior Suites and Twin rooms and is perfect for families with children wishing to spend their holiday in Majorca.The apartment's outdoor pool is surrounded by gardens and terraces where you can enjoy the Majorcan sun.A full entertainment programme with evening shows and activities complete the leisure on offer at the Protur Palmeras Playa Aparthotel.
